``` #cloud-config package_upgrade: true packages:   - nginx write_files:   - owner: www-data:www-data     path: /etc/nginx/sites-available/default     content: |       server {           listen         80 default_server;           root           /var/www/site;           index          index.html;           try_files $uri /index.html;       }   - owner: www-data:www-data     path: /var/www/site/index.html     content: |                                        Example

                  runcmd:   - service nginx restart ```
